snippet: Niconovum, a unit of Reynolds American, will work with a Pinney affiliate to develop a new kind of nicotine gum and other nicotine-replacement products like electronic cigarettes.
abstract: Reynolds American unit Niconovum will work with Pinney Associates to develop new type of nicotine gum and other nicotine-replacement products including electronic cigarettes.
lead_paragraph: Niconovum, a unit of Reynolds American, will work with a Pinney affiliate to develop a new kind of nicotine gum and other nicotine-replacement products like electronic cigarettes.

headline.main: Reynolds Enters Partnership on Stop-Smoking Products
headline.print_headline: Reynolds Enters Partnership on Stop-Smoking Products
